original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunupassayaṁ nissāya yavakhettaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhu upassayam nissāya yava khettam hoti

original: Bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ uccāram pi passāvam pi saṅkāram pi vighāsam khette chaḍḍenti

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāca iti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ amhākam yava khettam dūsessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ uccāram pi passāvam pi saṅkāram pi vighāsam pi harite chaḍḍenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ uccāram pi passāvam pi saṅkāram pi vighāsam pi harite chaḍḍessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā saṅkāraṁ vā vighāsaṁ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī uccāram vā passāvam vā saṅkāram vā vighāsam vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṁ vā.
analyzed: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭha udakam vā

original: pubbaṇṇaṁ aparaṇṇaṁ yaṁ manussānaṁ upabhogaparibhogaṁ ropimaṁ.
analyzed: pubbaṇṇam aparaṇṇam yam manussānam upabhoga paribhogam ropima

original: Sakiṁ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sakim āṇattā bahukam pi chaḍḍeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Harite haritasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: harite harita saññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Harite aharitasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: harite a harita saññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā āpatti pācittiyassa
a harite harita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
a harite a harita saññā anāpatti
